recipe.title: Red Bell Pepper, Spinach, and Goat Cheese Salad with Oregano Dressing
ingredients: 4 cups (packed) baby spinach leaves, coarsely chopped (about 4 ounces)
3/4 cup crumbled soft fresh goat cheese
instructions: Whisk oil, lemon juice, and oregano in large bowl to blend. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Add spinach, bell peppers, celery, goat cheese, and red onion to dressing; toss to coat. Divide salad among 4 plates and serve.
